TEXT.TITLE: VMS MORTGAGE LP <VMLPZ> MONTHLY CASH PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: VMS Mortgage L.P. said it declared a regular monthly cash distribution of nine cts a depositary unit for the month of March, payable May 14, record April One. Reuter
